    Versione di Firefox  134.0.2    Versione del sistema operativo  Win11    Estensioni installate  nessuna    Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti   Antivirus Avast e protezioni comprese in Win11

title: Bring back second bar in Android/Fenix beta
content:
I use Firefox Beta on Android. Recently there was a change so that a second bar appeared on the screen. I have the URL bar at the top of the screen, and suddenly a second bar appeared at the bottom of the screen with back, forward, tab and new tab buttons. I got used to this and really liked it. However it has now disappeared. I am wondering if there is a setting which I can use to get the second bar back, but I don't know where to start looking. Is there changelog for beta releases which I could look at to work out what this bar even was?

Thanks.

title: Problemi con la visualizzazione della mia posta elettronica su Alice mail
content: Da circa 1 mese non riesco a completare la visualizzazione della mia posta elettronica sul portale Alice mail. Premetto che invece sia Firefox, sia il mio cellulare scaricano e visualizzano regolarmente le mail, ma non l'eventuale spam bloccato dal portale TIM. Entro regolarmente con le mia credenziali, viene visulizzata la prima schermata con il totale delle mail, ma quando chiedo la lista dettagliata ottengo solo una schermata bianca. Ho aperto una assistenza con TIM, ma si limitano a fare i soliti controlli automatici e per loro va tutto bene ( e scaricano il problema). Firefox è regolarmente aggiornato. Grazie per suggerimenti ed eventuali interventi per la soluzione del problema. Buon lavoro a tutti, cordiali saluti Mauro Ferrari - Cremona ferramaur@alice.it
creator: ferramaur

title: can't load/use regular-use webpages on v134.0.2?
content:
Since updating to v134.0.2 (win 11) parts of webpages I routinely use will not display/function properly. Generally, the websites crash/fail to display information and/or forms will not submit; I can click the button but no action occurs. This isn't consistent across webpages, but it is consistent on the pages where I experience the issue. I have tried:

  • Bulleted list itemclearing my browser history/cookies/cache (obviously)
  • Bulleted list itemdisabling/uninstalling my extensions
  • Bulleted list itemstarting ff in troubleshoot mode
  • Bulleted list itemdouble checking that my firewall still permitted ff to run after the update (per a '22 help article)
  • Bulleted list itemuninstalling/reinstalling my vpn to ensure that wasn't randomly interacting badly (it's been fine to date)

Pretty much everything short of a complete reinstall, which i really don't want to do (exporting all my bookmarks sounds like a major headache; i'd almost rather switch browsers until firefox updates again and pray that fixes it, haha). None of these made any difference; anybody have advice??

Thanks!!
